rigidity theorem 刚性定理rigorous solution 严格解ring 环
3.尸僵(rigor mortis) 尸体肌肉僵硬, 并使关节固定称为尸僵. 形成机制主要是三磷腺苷(ATP)酶的缺乏, 即死后肌肉中A.
（1）肉的死后僵直（Rigor mortis） 动物刚经屠宰后由于血液循环及氧的供应停止，正常代谢中断而处于无氧状态，于是某些活细胞 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin, literally stiffness', from rigere 'be stiff'

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚硬的, 刚性的, 严格的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rig正,直+id如……的→直的→刚硬的, 刚性的→严格的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正义[的,地], 公正[的,地], 正确[的,地]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 垂直的, 竖式的, 正直的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 端正地, 正当地, 正确地

Sentence.sentence: The university has poured resources into peer counseling to help students from inner-city schools adjust to the rigor (严格要求) and faster pace of a university classroom –and also to help minority students overcome the stereotype that they are less qualified.
They cannot adapt to the rigor of the school

sentences.en: The thick coat of the mountain goat protects it against the rigors of winter.
sentences.cn: 石山羊厚厚的皮毛可以抵御冬天的严寒。

sentences.en: The town managed to escape the rigors of war.
sentences.cn: 这个城镇设法逃过了战争的浩劫。
